name: Tidy HypeMachine
description:
Userstyle for a less cluttered and flashy looke on Hypem.com.
Removes a couple of elements and changes the style of others.

Using this style, the Hype Machine looks and performs more like a traditional music player.
additional_info:
Release 11: Complete rewrite for new design of the HypeMachine

Release 10: Small optimizations.

Release 9: Complete rewrite using less heavy changes.

Might still have some bugs.
